name: The Night Owl Murder
storyline: You are Walter Kane, NYPD Detective. While investigating the Night Owls drug ring, you are called to a crime scene- a seemingly unrelated murder. What happens next may be the break you are looking for...
summary: You need to solve the case before a chip in victim's head runs of out time. However, the time passes ONLY through your actions. So feel free to read and listen to dialogues in your own pace. Time passes only when you click on a dialogue option. Time is limited so choose wisely!
